LanguageData.CP_Combat.label: Kinectomancer
LanguageData.CP_Combat.description: Kinectomancers shape the very raw mana itself into powerful kinetic attacks.
LanguageData.CP_Combat.tooltip: Kinectomancers are a purely offensive focused mage displine that perfect the very basic art of moulding raw mana into a lethal magical weapon. Highly skilled Kinectomancers can even manipulate raw mana to experience pressure from afar.
